title: Thirst
description: Glimpsed Through A WindowNight after night, the nude man is visible inside his Manhattan highrise. Tall, dark and beautifully proportioned, he’s a voyeur’s dream. In the glittering city that never sleeps, plenty like to watch and plenty have enjoyed the free show. But the vampire known as Var wants to do more than just look.Thirsting For His TouchFor 2,000 years, Var has used men for both blood and pleasure. He does not seduce; he takes. After glimpsing the nude stranger, Var is determined to have him. But quenching his thirst will come at a price…Warning: this story combines erotica and horror. It contains a non-con theme as well as graphic m/m sex and violence. Not intended for the immature or easily offended.
author: T. Baggins
